TestReportSteps.testObjective: To verify that user is able to save potential hotspot with added hotspot type.
TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Invoke the save potential hotspot API /api/blackspot. Verify that new hotspot can be saved with hotspot type added.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to save potential hotspot with added hotspot type.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to save potential hotspot with added hotspot type.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to save potential hotspot with added hotspot type.
